ingredients.content: 4 oz bacon, cut into pieces (¼ in.)
22 oz floury potatoes, cubed (½ in.), divided
18 19 - 20 oz minced clams, canned, (2 x 10 oz or 3 x 6.5 oz cans), drained, reserve 4 oz clam juice

preparations.content: Place onions and celery into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add butter, bacon and 7 oz potatoes and without measuring cup sauté <b>20 min/250°F/speed 1<b>.
Add remaining 15 oz potatoes, clam juice, salt and pepper and cook <b>15 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>.
Add milk and clams and cook <b>3 min/185°F//speed <b>. Serve hot.
